name: issues_add_comment
description: Add a comment to an issue

azure_organization.description: Optionally set the Azure DevOps organization name. Required for Azure DevOps

azure_project.description: Optionally set the Azure DevOps project name. Required for Azure DevOps

comment.description: The text content of the comment

issue_id.description: The ID of the issue to comment on

provider.description: Specify the issue provider. Default is LINEAR

repository_organization.description: Organization name. This is required for GitHub and GitLab
